## Fire Visualization

```{r}
#load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(viridis)    

```

```{r}
#load files
ConfirmedSite <- read_csv("~/Desktop/GitHub/Focal_Project_STREAMS/ConfirmedSite.csv")
```

```{r}
##Boxplots of all cram scores
#plot all index to identify patterns
ConfirmedSite %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=indexscore)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_point(aes(color=`Fire/Control`))

#plot all buffer to identify patterns
ConfirmedSite %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=bufferlan)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_point(aes(color=`Fire/Control`))

#plot all hydrology to identify patterns
ConfirmedSite %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=hydrology)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_point(aes(color=`Fire/Control`))

#plot all physical to identify patterns
ConfirmedSite %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=physical)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_point(aes(color=`Fire/Control`))

#plot all biotic to identify patterns
ConfirmedSite %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=biotic_str)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  geom_point(aes(color=`Fire/Control`))


```

```{r}
#isolating columns of interest
SmallSites <- ConfirmedSite[c(3:11)]

#pivoting to analyze in grid
pivot <- SmallSites %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols= !Pair_ID,
   names_to =  "Score_Type",
   values_to = "Score"
  )

```

```{r}
#isolating pairs
G1 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "1")
G2 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "2")
G3 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "3")
G4 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "4")
G5 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "5")
G6 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "6")
G7 <- ConfirmedSite %>% filter(Group_ID == "7")

G1 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=indexscore, color=`Fire/Control`)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(aes(group=Pair_ID))

ConfirmedSite %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=`Pre/Post_Fire`, y=indexscore, shape='Fire/Control'))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Group_ID)) +
  scale_color_viridis(option = "D")+
  geom_line(aes(group=Pair_ID))

```
